bug.author: Vafilor
bug.summary: Onepanel syncer - tries syncing if already syncing?
bug.description: If we are syncing a lot of files, and the timer is set to a low enough value, does the syncer retry the sync action while one is already going? Need to test this, and if it does happen, stop it.
